attributes.action: any attack on military, ex military and veterans the culprit should serve their sentence with military either their prison or in service
attributes.additional_details: Attacks on military in the UK increasing, and ex service men and veterans included. It should be the case that if you knowingly attack someone in military uniform you then are punished under military rule. Either in their prisons or in service. Either way, it would make them think twice and life wouldn't be so comfy like a normal prison
